entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:56 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 9:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %

Wind: WSW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
